requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: May work in older GPUs but fps drops are expected
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 3050 or higher cards
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
